TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件，即只是一个占位符的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control, which is just a placeholder, is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源查看，包括中的属性的值的设计时控件**属性**网格中，是保持为标记源代码，编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control, which includes the values of the properties in the **Properties** grid, is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. ## Examples 本部分提供两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何扩展类。The first demonstrates how to extend the class. 第二个示例演示如何派生一份类并将其与设计器相关联。The second demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with a designer. 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 该代码改变的占位符，表示设计图面上的控件并将属性添加到**属性**网格。The code alters the placeholder that represents the control on the design surface and adds a property to the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以派生一份类并将其与已在前面的示例中定义的设计器关联。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with the designer that was defined in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类创建一个占位符，供关联时设计图面上的控件。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates a placeholder for the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 实现设计器属性，以便隐藏关联控件的 属性。

span.span: Implements a designer property to shadow the property of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含与 关联的数据文件的名称和路径。

span.span: A that contains the name and path of the data file associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性的名称和包含 Microsoft Access 数据库的.mdb 文件的路径为设计器使用的关联中控件。Set the property in the designer to the name and path of the .mdb file containing the Microsoft Access database to use for the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示的名称和路径访问数据文件的关联中在设计时控件占位符控件。The following code example shows how to use the property to display the name and path of the Access data file that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetConnectionString() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetConnectionString () As String

summary.span: 为与此设计器关联的控件获取在设计时有效的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.

returns.span: 对于关联的 ， 包含其设计时连接。

span.span: A that contains the design-time connection string for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法地图设计器的站点，然后使用该控件的属性要生成连接字符串的控件的属性。The method maps the property of the control to the designer site, and then uses the property of the control to generate the connection string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以显示 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串关联中在设计时控件占位符控件。The following code example shows how to use the method to display the connection string of the Microsoft Access database that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 由设计器用于在“属性”网格中添加或移除属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自的方法方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加属性，或删除它们，从**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid. 有关控件，方法创建设计时属性，以便隐藏的控件属性。For the control, the method creates the design-time property to shadow the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来执行属性只读的并显示在**属性**网格。The following code example shows how to override the method to make the property read-only and visible in the **Properties** grid. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)]

para.span: 重写方法可以将属性添加到设计时属性集合，或更改其属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to the design-time property collection or change their attributes.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
